Input File formattingÂ¶

To format the fasta input file:

>Short name|Full name
sequence nucleotides (actg)

Short name is the abbreviation or accession number you want for output files (e.g. HPV16). Full name is what will be printed to the screen (e.g. Human papillomavirus 16).
